room_title: Escape room "Fallout" by Escape Games Worcester in Worcester
review: Tons of fun! Had a party of six and solved the Fallout room. It was very tricky, we had a lot of luck, definitely worth it. I would go back to solve another one.

room_title: Escape room "Fallout" by Escape Games Worcester in Worcester
review: The Fallout room was such an adrenaline rush! So much fun and what awesome puzzles! Teamwork was a must.

room_title: Escape room "Fallout" by Escape Games Worcester in Worcester
review: We did the Fallout room with our teenagers. We escaped with 1:13 to spare! Canâ€™t wait to try another room!

room_title: Escape room "Fallout" by Escape Games Worcester in Worcester
review: My friends and I took on the Fallout room, and it was so much fun. We managed to make it out alive with time to spare!It was my second experience doing an escape type game, my first time was in Boston. This one was far better thematically.Highly recommend the Fallout room!

room_title: Escape room "Fallout" by Escape Games Worcester in Worcester
review: I went for the first time last weekend with my cousin, my 11-year-old son, and 3 strangers. We got out of Fallout with about 3.5 minutes left on the clock! We were all first timers except for one lady and I couldn't believe how well we came together and expressed various strengths on various tasks mixed with a little luck on one or two of them. I really appreciated the enthusiasm of the Game Masters. Thank you for this experience!
